text: Nabil Arlabelek better known by the artistic name Naps (born 27 July 1991, in Marseille, France) is a French rapper of Algerian origin. Coming from the Air Bell suburb of Marseilles, he started rapping in 2006 at the age of 15. Two years later he formed Click 11.43 with two other rappers, KOFS and Sahime. The formation had considerable following particularly with the incarcerated population in France. Naps also released his own solo materials and collaborated with many other rappers.20minutes: Marseille: «Un disque de platine c’est comme un ballon d'or», assure Naps qui sort son troisième album In January 2020, Naps announced that he has stopped all artistic activity and has destroyed his gold certified album.13 or du hiphop: Naps annonce qu'il stoppe carrière et détruit son disque d'or ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !
